Project Changelog

v x.x.x

Updates in this release

  • Fieldset and legend styling for form controls.
  • Added panel with quote card variation.
  • Added .vertical-push compliment to .vertical-offset.
  • Added .quote-bar global pattern.
  • Added !important to the .pos and .neg utility classes.
  • Added .add-to-watchlist class.
  • Added .time utility class to match properties.
  • Added .page-header.quote-header variation to support adjusted spacing on quote headers.
  • Created $xxxx-data-point variables for primary, secondary and tertiary data points.
  • Added a make-auto-column mixin in the grid system.
  • Added ETRADE version of bootstrap carousels.
  • Added centering mixins to src/mixins/_layouts.scss. Centering mixins position elements horizontally & vertically using absolute positioning with transform: translate.
  • Added .pos and .neg variations to .et-select-wrapper for use in options trading.

Fixes in this release

  • Fixed issue on Panels documentation where ETrade Fort was being used for the panel text.
  • Improved the global message column structure.

New page templates added

  • Dark page with slab
  • Long Form
  • Tabbed Page
  • Quote Header
  • Right Rail
  • Tabbed Rail

Styleguide changes

  • Added input / button component to the forms documentation.
  • Documented carousels

v 1.1.0

Major updates in this release

  • Changed h1 (page title) font size from 36 to 30px.
  • Added new .primary-data-point, .secondary-data-point and .tertiary-data-point classes to the system.
  • Adjusted the font sizes for the now deprecated .primary, .secondary and .tertiary classes to match their .xxx-data-point replacements.
  • Changed the main .container padding-top to 10px.

Minor updates in this release

  • Minor update to styleguide documentation to show form field error styling.
  • Added disabled .et-select documentation to the forms page in the styleguide.

v 1.0.10

Released 08/12/2015

Updates in this release

  • Minor update to the styleguide to document long and short formats for timestamps.

v 1.0.9

Released 08/11/2015

Updates in this release

  • Styleguide updated with improved panels documentation.
  • Added panel with card variation. This pattern is common to panels in the Trade ticket.

v 1.0.8

Released 08/05/2015

Updates in this release

  • Fix to timestamp format in docs

v 1.0.7

Released 08/04/2015

Updates in this release

  • Created new classes for data point font sizing (.primary-data-point, .secondary-data-point, .tertiary-data-point), deprecating .primary, .secondary, .tertiary. This is for adjusting sizes and better class name clarity.

v 1.0.6

Released 07/28/2015

Updates in this release

Source code updates

  • Added pagination component
  • Checkboxes now use the Etrade Icon font graphic
  • Font weight adjustments to h2 and h4 elements.

Documentation updates

  • Improved typography documentation.
  • Added documentation for pagination.
  • Minor fix to add form-control to et-select code sample in docs.

v 1.0.5

Released 07/21/2015

Documentation updates

  1. Add the logo "Commision Free EFT" to the EFT Flyout
  2. Additionally the "Allstar" logo was cropped, so now "All-Star-Fund" needs to be added as text to the right of the logo.

v 1.0.4

Released 06/16/2015

Updates in this release

Source code updates

  1. New layout mixins (horizontal-layout and vertical-layout) with convenience classes.
  2. New global element classes for .hopper-nav, .page-refresh and .global-message aka EBM aka Emergency Broadcast Messages.
  3. Minor update to .pos and .neg convenience classes to support icons with :before pseudo content.
  4. Updates to .table-striped and .table-expandable hover row colors, switch even/odd row coloring
  5. Updated vertical spacing convenience classes to support new .vertical-offset-{x} convention. The old .voffset{x} convention will remain in place but considered deprecated.
  6. Nav pills without the "justified" class now distribute space based on the length of their words
  7. Normalized icon colors
  8. Removed zebra striping from news lists
  9. Update toggle switch styles
  10. Limit width of list-news first column

Documentation updates

  1. Incremental improvement to the overall site design.
  2. Improved site navigation.
  3. Added basic page template with global elements and major tabs.
  4. Iconography page has an in-page search filter.
  5. Improved design for the grid system page.
  6. Table null states
  7. Consolidated form elements documentation into new elements/forms.html page.
  8. New foundation/layout.html page to document horizontal & vertical layout mixins.
  9. Folded the vertical spacing page into layouts documentation.
  10. Implemented new harp partials directory in the root folder of docs as a place to store components that may be used across the docs.

Build system updates

  1. Simplify sass build process for development
  2. Switch to bower versioning, which involved removing version numbers from the concatonated CSS

v.1.0.3

  1. Nav pills without the "justified" class now distribute space based on the length of their words
  2. Normalized icon colors
  3. Removed zebra striping from news lists
  4. Update toggle switch styles
  5. Limit width of list-news first column

v.1.0.2

Released 05/05/2015

Updates in this release

  1. Bugfix for issue where stylguide .zip downloads were 404ing.

v.1.0.1

Released 05/05/2015

Updates in this release

  1. Styleguide revision Switched to a harpjs project structure.

  2. New build process using gulp to build distributions, generate docs and deploying the static website.

  3. Better semantic versioning. Generated .css files and downloadable .zip archives reflect their version #'s (ex: etrade-bootstrap.1.0.1). The styleguide docs display the current release number in the main nav.

  4. Archiving old versions of the guide. Example: http://styleguide.etradecreative.com/1.0.0/docs/ to view the previous release while http://styleguide.etradecreative.com/ will always reflect the current state.

  5. Removed the config folder which contained old mina logic for deployments.

  6. Styleguide updated with Flyout documentation.

  7. Styleguide updated with Utitiy & Hopper Nav documentation.
